channel.title: Roadkill on John Lloyd
channel.description: Recent content in Roadkill on John Lloyd

item.title: Wildlife-friendly Highways
item.description: How can we make roads safer for wildlife and for drivers? In this video, produced by Oregon Public Broadcasting, Peter Singleton and I discuss the problems that roads pose for wildlife and offer up some potential solutions. Originally broadcast as Episode 1801 of OBP’s “Oregon Field Guide”.
